questions.questionText: What is the difference between parametric and non-parametric tests?
questions.correctAnswer: Parametric tests assume data follows a normal distribution; non-parametric tests do not.
questions.explanation: Parametric examples: t-test, ANOVA. Non-parametric: Mann-Whitney U, Kruskal-Wallis.

questions.questionText: What is the Central Limit Theorem?
questions.correctAnswer: As sample size increases, the sampling distribution of the mean approaches normal regardless of population distribution.
questions.explanation: CLT allows normal methods with large samples.
